parameter.value: Heeeeelo |PLAYERNAME|! Whaats youuur need? Im seeelling rune and potion and for backpack ruuuune just say(BUY BP SD ETC)
I am the heeead alchemist of Dooorion. I keep the secret reciiiipies of our ancestors. Besides, I {trade} mana and health potions, spellboooooks, waaaaands, roooods and runes.
